botan.pubkey.pkcs8

PKCS #8

License:
Botan is released under the Simplified BSD License (see LICENSE.md)

class PKCS8Exception: botan.utils.exceptn.DecodingError;
PKCS #8 General Exception

SecureArray!ubyte BER_encode(in PrivateKey key);
BER encode a private key

Params:
PrivateKey key the private key to encode

Returns:
BER encoded key

string PEM_encode(in PrivateKey key);
Get a string containing a PEM encoded private key.

Params:
PrivateKey key the key to encode

Returns:
encoded key

Vector!ubyte BER_encode(in PrivateKey key, RandomNumberGenerator rng, in string pass, Duration dur = 300.msecs, in string pbe_algo = "");
Encrypt a key using PKCS #8 encryption

Params:
PrivateKey key the key to encode
RandomNumberGenerator rng the rng to use
string pass the password to use for encryption
Duration dur number of time to run the password derivation
string pbe_algo the name of the desired password-based encryption algorithm; if empty ("") a reasonable (portable/secure) default will be chosen.

Returns:
encrypted key in binary BER form

string PEM_encode(in PrivateKey key, RandomNumberGenerator rng, in string pass, Duration dur = 300.msecs, in string pbe_algo = "");
Get a string containing a PEM encoded private key, encrypting it with a password.

Params:
PrivateKey key the key to encode
RandomNumberGenerator rng the rng to use
string pass the password to use for encryption
Duration dur number of milliseconds to run the password derivation
string pbe_algo the name of the desired password-based encryption algorithm; if empty ("") a reasonable (portable/secure) default will be chosen.

Returns:
encrypted key in PEM form

PrivateKey loadKey(DataSource source, RandomNumberGenerator rng, SingleShotPassphrase get_pass);
Load a key from a data source.

Params:
DataSource source the data source providing the encoded key
RandomNumberGenerator rng the rng to use
SingleShotPassphrase get_pass a function that returns passphrases

Returns:
loaded private key object

PrivateKey loadKey(DataSource source, RandomNumberGenerator rng, in string pass = "");
Load a key from a data source.

Params:
DataSource source the data source providing the encoded key
RandomNumberGenerator rng the rng to use
string pass the passphrase to decrypt the key. Provide an empty string if the key is not encrypted

Returns:
loaded private key object

PrivateKey loadKey(in string filename, RandomNumberGenerator rng, SingleShotPassphrase get_pass);
Load a key from a file.

Params:
string filename the path to the file containing the encoded key
RandomNumberGenerator rng the rng to use
SingleShotPassphrase get_pass a function that returns passphrases

Returns:
loaded private key object

PrivateKey loadKey(in string filename, RandomNumberGenerator rng, in string pass = "");
Load a key from a file.

Params:
string filename the path to the file containing the encoded key
RandomNumberGenerator rng the rng to use
string pass the passphrase to decrypt the key. Provide an empty string if the key is not encrypted

Returns:
loaded private key object

PrivateKey copyKey(in PrivateKey key, RandomNumberGenerator rng);
Copy an existing encoded key object.

Params:
PrivateKey key the key to copy
RandomNumberGenerator rng the rng to use

Returns:
new copy of the key
